title: Stuck on sync && RPC daemon crash
body:
#### System information
Erigon version: erigon version 2021.06.4-alpha
OS & Version: Linux

#### Expected behaviour
Erigon doesn't stuck on block processing && rpcdaemon doesn't crash.

#### Actual behaviour
